name: Humanitarium
description:
In the tiny hilltop village of Lahitere (population 25) bordering the national reserve of the French Pyrenees, nestled among the verdant foothills below the 2,788 metre Pic du Midi, lies a small, family run recording studio and record label.  During the summer of 2013 this studio became host to 7 musicians, from 7 different countries, most of whom had never met before, yet who, during the course of 6 days, wrote, arranged and recorded an album of original material due for release on the 8th November 2013.  

The songs represent a veritable mixing pot of cultures, styles, backgrounds and languages, all the more unique because of the short timescale in which it was created.

The music in the Humanitarium, is unashamedly human.  There is no autotune, quantizing, overdubbing or drum programming, looping, synthesising editing or correcting.  Just people with acoustic instruments making fresh, new music with one eye on its roots and the other on the future.

Now the musicians have returned to their homes, thousands of miles apart, and yet, from these 6 days together, the songs they wrote together and the album enclosed, they are forever connected to each other, and to that small French village in the Pyrenees.

name: Nothing Concrete album
description:
Album of new material from international folk rock band Nothing Concrete, featuring the songs of Fergus McKay (UK) and Daniel Wall (USA) played with an international group of musicinas from 7 different countries.

Recorded at Pear studios Manchester and in Lahitere France, produced by Mick Brophy and the band,

To hear sample tracks visit https://soundcloud.com/fergus-mckay

name: Puck Fop T shirt
description:
my new 100% cotton T shirt, available in all sizes just make sure you tell me which size you want, available in Blue, if you would rather another colour, make a request and I may get some other colours printed! 

displays on the front "PUCK FOP - support street music" with a picture of Bandolino!

name: Bandolino and the Ringmasters Wife, CD album
description:
The new album by Bandolino contains 16 studio recorded tracks, and comes with a 3d cover and free 3d glasses and 3 specially commissioned cartoons depicting 3 of the songs.

limited edition: the first 200 copies sold will be personally signed
